SA15bsa0552u:4: yat sat tat kṣaṇikaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ santaścāmī vivādāspadībhūtāḥ padārthā iti /
SA15bsa0552u:5: hetoḥ parokṣārthapratipādakatvaṃ hetvābhāsatvaśaṅkānirākaraṇamantareṇa na śakyate pratipādayituṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:8: yadi nāma darśane darśane nānāprakāraṃ sattvalakṣaṇamuktamāste,
SA15bsa0552u:15: yadeva hi pramāṇato nirūpyamāṇaṃ padārthānāṃ sattvamupapannaṃ bhaviṣyati;
SA15bsa0552u:19: tacca yathāyogaṃ pratyakṣānumānapramāṇaprasidvasadbhāveṣu bhāveṣu pakṣīkṛteṣu pratyakṣādinā pramāṇena pratītamiti na svarūpeṇāśrayadvāreṇa vāsidvasambhāvanāpi //
SA15bsa0552u:29: sambhave vā tenaiva pakṣe 'pi kṣaṇabhaṅgasidveralaṃ sattānumāneneti cet /
SA15bsa0552u:32: tathā ghaṭo varttamānakṣaṇe tāvat ekāmarthakriyāṃ karoti /
SA15bsa0552u:33: atītānāgatakṣaṇayorapi kiṃ tāme vārthakriyāṃ kuryādanyāṃ vā,
SA15bsa0552u:37: yadā ghaṭo varttamānakṣaṇabhāvi kāryyaṃ karoti tadā kimatītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvinyapi kāryye śakto 'śakto vā /
SA15bsa0552u:38: yadi śaktastadā varttamānakṣaṇabhāvikāryyavat atītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvyapi kāryyaṃ kuryyāt tatrāpi śaktatvāt śaktasya kṣepāyogāt /
SA15bsa0552u:41: athāśaktastadā ekatra kāryye śaktāśaktatvaviruddhadharmmādhyāsāt kṣaṇavidhvaṃso ghaṭasya durvvāraprasaraḥ syāt /
SA15bsa0552u:43: yadā hi śaktasya svabhāvasya vilambo 'pyasahyastadā dūrītsāritamakaraṇam /
SA15bsa0552u:48: tadevamekatra kāryye samarthetarasvabhāvatayā pratikṣaṇaṃ bhedāt ghaṭasya sapakṣatvamakṣatam /
SA15bsa0552u:53_1: sakalakriyātikramakāle ca ghaṭe dharmmiṇi parābhyupagamamātrataḥ sidvatvāt asidvistāvadasambhavinī /
SA15bsa0552u:57: sākṣādajanake 'pi kuśūlādyavasthitavījādau vipakṣe samarthavyavahāragocaratvasya sādhanasya darśanāditi cet /
SA15bsa0552u:60: tatra yatpāramārthikam jananaprayuktaṃ jananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ tadiha sādhanatvenopāttaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:61: tasya ca kuśūlādyavasthita vījādau kāraṇakāraṇatvāt aupacārikajananavyavahāraviṣayabhūte sambhavābhāvāt kutaḥ sādhāraṇānaikāntikatā /
SA15bsa0552u:68: yadi ca jananamantareṇāpi jananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ syāt tadā sarvvasya sarvvatra jananavyavahāra ityaniyamaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa0552u:70: tato jananābhāve vipakṣe niyataviṣayatvasya vyāpakasya nivṛttau nivarttamānaṃ jananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ janana eva viśrāmyatīti vyāptisidveranavadyo hetuḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:71: na caiṣa ghaṭo varttamānakāryyakaraṇakṣaṇe sakalakriyātikramaṇe ca atītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvikāryyaṃ janayati /
SA15bsa0552u:76: tattadā tatra samarthavyavahārayogyaṃ yathā śālyaṅkuramakurvvan kodravaḥ śālyaṅkure /
SA15bsa0552u:77: na karoti caiṣa ghaṭo varttamānakṣaṇabhāvikāryyakaraṇakāle sakalakriyātikramakāle cātītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvikāryyamiti vyāpakānupalabdhirbhinatti samarthakṣaṇādasamarthakṣaṇam /
SA15bsa0552u:80: na cānaikāntikatā pūrvvoktena nyāyena samartha vyavahāragocaratvajanakatvayovidhibhūtayoḥ sarvvopasaṃhāravatyā vyāpteḥ prasādhanāt /
SA15bsa0552u:81: yatpunaratroktaṃ yadyadā yanna karoti na tattadā tatra samarthamityatra kaḥ karotyarthaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:88: na cātrapakṣe kāraṇatvasāmarthyayoḥ paryyāyatvena vyāpakānupalambhasya sādhyāviśiṣṭatvamabhidhātumucitaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:90: kāraṇatvasamarthavyavahāragocaratvayośca bṛkṣaśiṃśapayoriva vyāvṛttibhedo 'stītyanavasara eva evaṃvidhasya kṣudrapralāpasya /
SA15bsa0552u:91: tadevaṃ prasaṅgaprasaṅgaviparyyayahetudvayabalato ghaṭe dṛṣṭānte kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ siddhaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:95: dṛṣṭāntamātra eva prasaṅgaprasaṅgaviparyyayābhyāṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgaprasādhanāt nanvābhyāmeva pakṣe 'pi kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhirastviti cet /
SA15bsa0552u:97: yo hi pratipattā prativastu yadyadā yajjananavyavahārayogyaṃ tattadā tajjanayatītyā dikamupanyasituṃ analasastasya tata eva kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:98_0: yastu prativastu tannyāyopanyāsaprayāsabhīruḥ sa ttvekatradharmmiṇi yadyadā yajjananavyavahārayogyaṃ
SA15bsa0552u:99_1: samarthetarasvabhāvavirudvadharmmā dhyāsāt bheda eveti kṣaṇabhaṅgatayā sapakṣatāmāvahati
SA15bsa0552u:101: atraiva sādharmmyavati dṛṣṭānte sarvvopasaṃhāravatyā vyāpteḥ prasādhanāt /
SA15bsa0552u:102: nanu viparyyaye bādhakapramāṇabalābdyāptisiddhistasya copanyāsavārttāpi nāsti tatkathaṃ vyāptiḥ prasādhiteti cet /
SA15bsa0552u:104_1: 'pi ghaṭasya śaktisambhave tadānīmevaitat karaṇamakaraṇe ca śaktāśaktasvabhāvatayā
SA15bsa0552u:104_2: pratikṣaṇaṃ bheda iti kṣaṇikatvena vyāptaiva sā arthakriyāśaktiḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:105: nanvevaṃ anvayamātramastu vipakṣāt punarekāntena vyāvṛttiriti kuto labhyamiti cet,
SA15bsa0552u:108: na dvividhā hi vyāptisiddhiranvayarūpā ca karttṛdharmmaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:110: vyatirekarūpā ca karmmadharmmaḥ sādhyābhāve sādhanasyāvaśyamabhāvo yaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:114: yathā viparyyaye bādhakapramāṇabalāt niyamavati vyatireke siddhe anvayaviṣayaḥ saṃśayaḥ pūrvvaṃ sthito 'pi paścātparigalati /
SA15bsa0552u:116: tathā prasaṅgatadviparyyayahetudvayabalato niyamavatyanvaye siddhe vyatirekaviṣaye pūrvvaṃ sthito 'pi sandehaḥ paścātparigalatyeva /
SA15bsa0552u:119_0: sādhane sati sādhyasyāvaśyamanvayo veti na kaścidarthabhedaḥ tadevaṃ viparyyayabādhakapramāṇamantareṇāpi
SA15bsa0552u:126: na ca pūrvvāparayoḥ kālayorekaḥ pratisandhātāsti kṣaṇabhaṅgabhaṅgaprasaṅgāt /
SA15bsa0552u:128: na ca pūrbbotarakālayoḥ sambittī tābhyāṃ vāsanā tayā ca hetuphalāvasāyī vikalpa iti yuktaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:129: sa hi vikalpo gṛhītānusandhāyako 'tadrūpasamāropako vā na prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:136: tathā hi vījādīnāṃ sāmarthyaṃ vījādijñānāt kāryyādaṅkurādervā niścetavyaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:150: tataśca sāmarthyasandehe bhavatītyeva vaktumaśakyaṃ kathamabhūtvābhāvitvaṃ kāryyatvaṃ setsyati /
SA15bsa0552u:151: apekṣitaparavyāpāratvaṃ kāryyatvamityapi nāsato dharmmaḥ sattvañca sāmarthyaṃ tacca sandigdhamiti kutaḥ kāryyasiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:152: tadasidvau pūrvvasya sāmarthyaṃ na sidhyatīti sandigdhāsidvo hetuḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:154: tathā hi kṣaṇikatve sati na tāvat ajātasyānanvayanirudvasya vā kāryyārambhakatvaṃ sambhavati /
SA15bsa0552u:155: na ca nispannasya tāvān kṣaṇo 'sti yamupādāya kasmaicit kāryyāya vyāpāryyet /
SA15bsa0552u:160: yadvā, sarvvasyaiva hetoḥ kṣaṇikatve sādhye virudvatvaṃ deśakālāntarānanugame sādhyasādhanabhāvābhāvāt anugame ca nānākālamekamakṣaṇikaṃ kṣaṇikatvena virudhyata iti /
SA15bsa0552u:167: anyathā yenaiva vacanena sāmarthyaṃ nāstīti pratipādyate tasyaiva tat pratipādanasāmarthyamavyāhatamāyātam /
SA15bsa0552u:169: tadasvīkāre tu na kaścit kvacit pravartteteti nirīhaṃ jagajjāyate /
SA15bsa0552u:172: sā ca kṣaṇikatve yadi nopapadyate tadā virudvaṃ vaktumucitaṃ,
SA15bsa0552u:175: tathāhi kāraṇajñānopādeyabhūtena kāryyagrāhiṇā jñānena tadarpitasaṃskāragarbheṇa asya bhāve asya bhāva iti anvayaniścayo janyate,
SA15bsa0552u:176: tathā kāraṇāpekṣayā bhūtalakaivalyagrāhijñānopādeyabhūtena kāryyāpekṣayā bhūtalakaivalyagrāhiṇā jñānena tadarpitasaṃskāragarbhaṇa asyābhāve asyābhāva iti vyatirekaniścayo janyate /
SA15bsa0552u:188: kintu yatra pramāṇapratīte vījādau vastubhūte dharmmiṇi pramāṇapratītaṃ sāmarthya tatra kṣaṇābhaṅga sādhanāya /
SA15bsa0552u:190: anyathā na kvacidapi vastumātrasyāpi pratipattiḥ syāt /
SA15bsa0552u:191: tasmācchāstrīyasattvalakṣaṇasandehe 'pi paṭupratyakṣavalāvalambitavastubhāve aṅkurādau kāryyatvamupalabhyamānaṃ vījādeḥ sāmarthyamupasthāpayatīti nāsidvidoṣāvakāśaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:198: adhyavaseyavastvapekṣayaiva sarvvatra prāmāṇyapratipādanāt vastusvabhāvasyaiva kṣaṇikatvasidviriti kva virodhaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:199: yacca gṛhyate yaccādhyavasīyate te dve api anyanivṛttī na vastunī svalakṣaṇāvagāhitve abhilāpasaṃsargānupapatteriti cet /
SA15bsa0552u:211: yathā sarvvasyāsattve 'pi vījādaṅkurasyaivotpattiḥ dṛṣṭasya niyatahetuphalabhāvasya pratikṣeptumaśakyatvāt /
SA15bsa0552u:212: paraṃ vāhyenārthena sati pratibandhe prāmāṇyamanyathātvaprāmāṇyamiti viśeṣaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:214: nānākālasyaikasya vastuno vastuto 'sambhavepyatadrūpaparāvṛttayoreva sādhyasādhanayoḥ pratyakṣeṇa vyāptigrahaṇāt /
SA15bsa0552u:215: dvividho hi pratyakṣasya viṣayo grāhyo 'dhyavaseyaśca sakalātadrūpaparāvṛttaṃ vastumātraṃ sākṣādasphuraṇāt pratyakṣasya grāhyo viṣayo mā bhūt /
SA15bsa0552u:229: antime tu vikalpadvaye sāmānyādhāratayā dṛṣṭa eva viśeṣaḥ sāmānyasya viśeṣyo viśeṣaṇaṃ vā karttavyaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:231: yadvā dṛṣṭādṛṣṭātmako deśakālāntarabartī atadrūpaparāvṛttaḥ sarvvo viśeṣaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:241: anyathā ghaṭo 'pi ghaṭasantāno 'pi pratyakṣato na sidhyet sarvvātmanā grahaṇābhāvāt /
SA15bsa0552u:243: yadyevamanenaiva krameṇa sarvvasya viśeṣasya viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvavat vyāptipratipattirapyastu /
SA15bsa0552u:244: tat kimarthaṃ nānākālamekakṣaṇikamabhyupagantavyaṃ yena kṣaṇikatve sādhanasya virudvatvaṃ syāt iti na kaścidvirodhaprabhedaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:247: nanu yadi prasaṅgaviparyyayahetudvayavalato ghaṭe dṛṣṭānte kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ sidhyettadā sattvasya niyamena kṣaṇikatvena vyāptisidveranaikāntikatvaṃ na syāditi yuktam /
SA15bsa0552u:249: tathāhi śakto 'pi ghaṭaḥ kramisahakāryyapekṣayā kramikāryyaṃ kariṣyati /
SA15bsa0552u:250: na caitad vaktavyaṃ samartho 'rthaḥ svarūpeṇa karoti /
SA15bsa0552u:251: svarūpañca sarvvadāstītyanupakāriṇi sahakāriṇyapekṣā na yujyata iti,
SA15bsa0552u:254: na ca tayorāvirbhāvatirobhāvābhyāṃ tadvataḥ kācit kṣatiḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:256: tasmādarthaḥ samartho 'pi syāt na ca karotīti sandigdhavyatirekaḥ prasaṅgahetuḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:259: tasya ca yādṛśaścaramakṣaṇe 'kṣepakriyādharmmā svabhāvaḥ tādṛśa eva cet prathamakṣaṇe tadā tadāpi prasahya kurbbāṇo brahmaṇāpyanivāryyaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:260: na ca so 'pyakṣepakriyādharmmā svabhāvaḥ sākalye sati jāto bhāvādbhinna evābhidhātuṃ śakyaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:265: akṣepakriyāpratyanīkasvabhāvasya prācyasya paścādanuvṛttau kathaṃ kadācidapi kāryyasambhavaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:266: nanu yadi sa evaikaḥ karttā syāt yuktametat /
SA15bsa0552u:267: kintu sāmagrī janikā tataḥ sahakāryyantaravirahavelāyāṃ balīyaso 'pi na kāryyaprasava iti kimatra virudvaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:268: na hi bhāvaḥ svarūpeṇakarotīti svarūpeṇaiva karoti /
SA15bsa0552u:273: atrocyate / yadā militāḥ santaḥ kāryyaṃ kurvvate tadaikārthakaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvamepāmastu ko niṣedvā?
SA15bsa0552u:274: militaireva tu tatkāryya karttavyamiti kuto labhyate?
SA15bsa0552u:277: tasmāt sāmagrī janika naikaṃ janakamiti sthiravādināṃ manorathasyāpyaviṣayaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:279: dṛśyatāṃ kintu pūrvvasthitādeva sāmagrīmadhyapraviṣṭādbhāvāt kāryotpattiranyasmādeva vā viśiṣṭādbhāvādutpannāditi vivādapadam /
SA15bsa0552u:280: tatra prāgapi sambhave sarvvadaiva kāryyotpatti rna vā kadācidapīti virodhamasamādhāya cakṣuṣī nimīlya tata eva kāryyotpattidarśanāditi sādhyānuvādamātrapravṛttaḥ kṛpāmarhatīti /
SA15bsa0552u:281: na ca pratyabhijñādibalādekatvasidviḥ tat pauruṣasya lūnapunarjātakeśanakhādāvapyupalambhato nirddalanāt,
SA15bsa0552u:285: vyāptau tu sākṣātparamparayā kāraṇamātrāpekṣayā kāraṇe vyāpake 'yogavyavacchedaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:288: tatsvabhāve ca vyāpye 'nyayogavyavacchedo vikalpāruḍharūpāpekṣayā vyāptau dvividhamavadhāraṃam /
SA15bsa0552u:289: nanu yadi pūrvvāparakālayorekasvabhāvo bhāvaḥ sarvvadājanakatvenājanakatvena vā vyāpta upalabdhaḥ syāttadāyaṃ prasaṅgaḥ saṅgacchate /
SA15bsa0552u:290: na kṣaṇabhaṅgavādinā pūrvvāparakālayorekaḥ kaścidupalabdha iti cet /
SA15bsa0552u:293: parakālabhāvī janako yaḥ svabhāvo bhāvasya sa eva yadi pūrvvakālabhāvī /
SA15bsa0552u:294: pūrvvakālabhāvī vā yo 'janakaḥ svabhāvaḥ sa eva yadi parakālabhāvī,
SA15bsa0552u:296: tathā ca sati sidvayoreva svabhāvayorekatvārope sidvameva jananamajananambāsajyata iti /
SA15bsa0552u:299_0: yasmāt dvividhaṃ sāmarthya nijamāgantukañca sahakāryyantaraṃ tato 'kṣaṇikasyāpi kramavat
SA15bsa0552u:299_1: sahakārinānātvādapi kramavat kāryyanānātvopapatteraśakyaṃ bhāvānāṃ pratikṣaṇamanyānyatvamupapādayitumiti cet /
SA15bsa0552u:302: tathāpi yat prātisvikaṃ vastusvalakṣaṇaṃ arthakriyādharmmakamavaśyamabhyupagantavyaṃ tat kiṃ prāgapi paścādeva veti vikalpya yaddūṣaṇamugdīritaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:304: yattu kāryyeṇaiva sahakāriṇo 'pekṣanta ityupatkṛtaṃ tadapi nirupayogaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:305: yadi hi kāryyameva svajanmani svatantraṃ syādyuktametat /
SA15bsa0552u:308: tathā ca sati santo hetavaḥ sarvvathāsamarthāḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:310: atha kāryyasyaivāyamaparādho yadidaṃ samarthe kāraṇe satyapi kadācinnopapadyata iti cet /
SA15bsa0552u:318: yadi hi svayambhavan bhāvayedeva hetuḥ svakāryyaṃ tadā tadabhāvaprayukto 'syābhāva iti pratītiḥ syāt /
SA15bsa0552u:319: no ced yathā kāraṇe satyapi kāryyasvātantryānna bhavati /
SA15bsa0552u:320: tathā tadabhāve 'pi svātantryādeva na bhūtamiti śaṅkā kena nivāryyeta /
SA15bsa0552u:324: tasmād yathaiva tadbhāve niyamena na bhavati /
SA15bsa0552u:330: yo hṛttarakāryyajananasvabhāvaḥ sa kathamādau kāryyaṃ kuryyāt /
SA15bsa0552u:331: na tarhi tatkāryyakaraṇasvabhāvaḥ na hi nīlotpādanasvabhāvaḥ pītādikamapi karotīti /
SA15bsa0552u:332: atrocyate / sthirasvabhāvatve hi bhāvasya uttarakālamevedaṃ kāryyaṃ na pūrvvakālamiti kuta etat /
SA15bsa0552u:334: kiṃ kurmmaḥ uttarakālameva tasya janmeti cet;
SA15bsa0552u:336: sthiṣtvepyeṣa eva svabhāvastasya yaduttarakṣaṇa eva karotīti cet /
SA15bsa0552u:338: dhūmādagnirityatrāpi svabhāva evāsya yadidānīmatra niragnirapi dhūma iti vaktuṃ śakyatvāt /
SA15bsa0552u:346: uttarakāryyajananavyavahāragocaratvañca tvadabhyupagamāt prathamakāryyakaraṇakāla eva ghaṭe dharmmiṇi sidvaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:347: atastanmātrānubandhina uttarābhimatasya kāryyasya prathame kṣaṇe 'sambhavādeva prasaṅgaḥ kriyate /
SA15bsa0552u:348: na hi nīlakārake 'pi pītakārakatvārope pītasambhavaprasaṅgaḥ svavacanavirodhonāma /
SA15bsa0552u:353: tathāhi bījamaṅkurādikaṃ kurvvad yadi yenaiva svabhāvenāṅkuraṃ karoti tenaiva kṣityādikantadākṣityādīnāmapyaṅkurasvābhāvyāpattiḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:354: nānāsvabhāvatvena tu kārakatve svabhāvānāmanyonyābhāvāvyabhicāritvādekatra bhāvābhāvau parasparavirudvau syātāmityekamapi bījaṃ bhidyeta /
SA15bsa0552u:361: tathā bījasyāṅkuraṃ prati kārakatvaṃ garddabhādikaṃ pratyakārakatvamiti kārakatvākārakatve api virudvau dharmau /
SA15bsa0552u:363: tadevamekatra bīje pradīpe rūpe ca vipakṣe paridṛśyamānaḥ śaktāśaktatvādirvirudvadharmmādhyāso na ghaṭāderbhedaka iti /
SA15bsa0552u:366: svabhāvānāṃ hyanyonyābhāvāvyabhicāre bhedaḥ prāptāvasaro na virodhaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:367: virodhastu yadvidhāne yanniṣedho yanniṣedhe yadvidhānaṃ tayorekatradharmmiṇi parasparaparihārasthitatayā syāt /
SA15bsa0552u:368: tadatraikaḥ svbhāvaḥ svābhāvena virudvo yukto bhāvābhāvavat /
SA15bsa0552u:374: tadyadi pratiyogitvābhāvādanyonyābhāvāvyabhicāri ṇāvapi svabhāvāvavirudvo tatkārakatvānyākārakatve vā viṣayabhedādavirudve,
SA15bsa0552u:378: kevalaṃ yathā tadeva kāryyaṃ prati kvaciddeśe śaktirdeśāntare cāśaktiriti deśabhedādavirudve śaktayaśaktī tathaikatraiva kāryye kālabhedādapyavirudve /
SA15bsa0552u:379: yathāpūrvvaṃ nniḥkriyaḥ sphaṭikaḥ sa eva paścāt sakriya iti cet /
SA15bsa0552u:380: ucyate / na hi vayaṃ paribhāṣāmātrādekatra kāryye deśabhedādavirudve śaktyaśaktī brūmaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:390: ekasya vā niyamena pramāṇāntareṇa bādhanānnityatvasattvavadvā bhavediti na kaścidarthabhedaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:391: tadatraikadharmmiṇi tat kālakāryyakāritvādhāre kālāntare tatkāryyākāritvasyānyakāryyakāritvasya vā niyamena pramāṇāntareṇa bādhanādvirodhaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:392: tathā hi yatraiva dharmmiṇi tatkālakāryyakāritvamupalabdhanna tatraiva kālāntare tat kāryyākāritvamanyakāryyakāritvaṃ vā brahmaṇāpyupasaṃharttuṃ śakyate,
SA15bsa0552u:397: ata eva vajro 'pi pakṣakūkṣau nikṣiptaḥ kathamasau sphaṭiko varākaḥ kālabhedenābhedāsādhanāya dṛṣṭāntībhavitumarhati /
SA15bsa0552u:398: na caivaṃ samānakālakāryyāṇāṃ deśabhede 'pi dharmmibhedo yukto bhedasādhakapramāṇābhāvādindriyapratyakṣeṇa nirastavibhramāśaṅkenābhedaprasādhanācca /
SA15bsa0552u:399: iti na kālabhede 'pi śaktyaśaktyorvirodhaḥ svasamayamātrādapahastayituṃ śakyaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:406: tathāhyupasapaṇapratyayena devadattakarapallavādinā sahacaro vījakṣaṇaḥ pūrvvasmādeva puñjāt samarthojāto 'napekṣa ādyātiśayasya janaka iṣyate /
SA15bsa0552u:407: tatra ca samānakuśūlajanmasu bahuṣu vijasantāneṣu kasmāt kiñcideva vījaṃ paramparayāṅkurotpādānuguṇamupajanayati bījakṣaṇānnānye vījakṣaṇā bhinnasantānāntaḥpātinaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:408: nahyupasarpaṇapratyayāt prāgeva teṣāṃ samānāsamānasantānavarttināṃ vījakṣaṇānāṃ kaścit paramparātiśayaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:409: athopasarpaṇāt prāṅna tat santāna varttino 'pi janayanti paramparayāpyaṅkurotpādānuguṇaṃ vījakṣaṇaṃ vījamātrajananātteṣāṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:411: hanta tarhi yadabhāve satyutpannopi na janayedeva /
SA15bsa0552u:412: tathā kevalānāṃ vyabhicārasambhavādādyātiśayotpādamaṅkuraṃ vā prati kṣityādīnāṃ parasparāpekṣāṇāmevotpādakatvamakāmakenāpi svīkarttavyaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:416: api cāntyo vījakṣaṇo 'napekṣo 'ṅkurādikaṃ kurvvan yadi yenaiva rūpeṇāṅkuraṃ karoti tenaiva kṣityādikaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:419: tathā hi vījasyāṅkuraṃ pratyupādānatvaṃ kṣityādikaṃ tu prati sahakāritvaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:424: abhede vā kathaṃ vījasya na nānātvaṃ bhinnatādātmyāt /
SA15bsa0552u:427: kśityādau janayitavye tadupādānam purvvameva kṣityādivījasya rūpāntaramiti /
SA15bsa0552u:431: na ca kṣaṇasyopakārasambhavo 'nyatra jananāt tasyābhedyatvādityanekatvamapi nāstīti dvitīyo 'pi vyāpakābhāvo na sidvaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:433: yadi manyetānupakārakā api bhavanti sahakāriṇo 'pekṣaṇīyāśca kāryyeṇānuvihitabhāvābhāvāt sahakaraṇācca /
SA15bsa0552u:435: kariṣyate ca kramavat sahakārivaśaḥ krameṇa kāryyāṇīti vyāpakānupalabdherasidveḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:440: atha pūrvvāvasthitasyaiva vījādeḥ sahakāriṇā saha sambhūyakaraṇaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:447: atha tadvā tādṛgvā āsīditi na kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:448: tatastādṛksvabhāvasambhavepyakaraṇaṃ sahakāriṇi nirapekṣatāṃ na kṣamata iti cet /
SA15bsa0552u:451: sa cādyātiśayajanakatvalakṣaṇaḥ svabhāvaviśeṣo na samānāsamānasantānavarttiṣu vījakṣaṇeṣu sarvveṣveva sambhavī kintu keṣucideva karmmakarakara pallavasahacareṣu /
SA15bsa0552u:452: nanvekatra kṣetre niṣpattilabanādipūrvvakamānīyaikatra kuśūle kṣiptāni sarvvāṇyeva vījāni sādhāraṇarūpāṇyeva pratīyante,
SA15bsa0552u:454: ucyate / kāraṇaṃ khalu sarvvatra kāryye dvividhaṃ dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭañca sarvvāstikaprasidvametat /
SA15bsa0552u:456: tato bhavedapi kāraṇasāmagrīśaktibhedāttādṛśaḥ svabhāvabhedaḥ keṣāñcideva vījakṣaṇānāṃ yena taeva vījakṣaṇā ādyātiśayamaṅkurambā paramparayā janayeyu rnānye vījakṣaṇāḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:463: pāṇisparśavataḥ kṣaṇasya na bhedabhinnānyakālakṣaṇādbhedo veti matadvaye mitibalaṃ yasyāstyasau jitvaraḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:465: sāmagrī tu na sarvvathekṣaṇasahā kāryyantu mānānugamamiti //
SA15bsa0552u:466: tadevaṃ nopakāro 'pekṣārtha ityanapekṣyaiva kṣaṇikasya sahakāriṣu nobhayavyāvṛttiḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:468: tadā yadi pūrvvasthitasyeti viśeṣaṇāpekṣā tadā kṣaṇikasya naivaṃ kadācidityanapekṣaivākṣīṇā /
SA15bsa0552u:473: yacca vījasyaikenaiva svabhāvena kārakatve kṣityādīnāmaṅkurasvābhāvyāpattiranyathā kāraṇābhede 'pi kāryyabhede 'pi kāryyasyāhetukatvaprasaṅgādityuktaṃ tadasaṅgataṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:477: yacca kāraṇābhede kāryyābheda ityuktaṃ tatra sāmagrīsvarūpaṃ kāraṇamabhipretaṃ sāmagrīsajātīyatve na kāryyavijātīyatetyarthaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:478: na punaḥ sāmagrīmadhyagatenaikenānekaṃ kāryyaṃ na karttavyaṃ nāma /
SA15bsa0552u:481: na cendriyapratyakṣaṃ bhinnadeśaṃ sapratighaṃ dṛśyamarthadvayamekamevopalambhayatīti kvacidupalabdhaṃ yena tatrāpi bhedaśaṅkā syāt /
SA15bsa0552u:486: tadetau dvāvapi vyāpakānupalambhāvasidvau na kṣaṇikāt sattvannivarttata iti nāyamasādhāraṇo hetuḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:487: api ca vidyamāno bhāvaḥ sādhyetarayoraniścitānvayavyatireko gandhavattādivadasādhāraṇo yuktaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:490: tadevaṃ śaktasya kṣepāyogāt samarthavyavahāragocaratvaṃ jananena vyāptamiti prasaṅgaviparyyayayoḥ sattve hetorapi nānaikāntikatvamataḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgasidviriti sthitam //
